#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
long reverse (long n)
{
	long r=0;
	int digit;
	while(n)
	{
		digit = n%10;
		r = r*10 + digit;
		n = n/10;
	}
	return r;
}
int prime (long n)
{
	int i;
	for (i=2;i<=n/2;i++)
	{
		if (n%i==0)
			return 0;
	}
	return 1;
}
int main()
{
	long n,rev;
	int prm;
	cin>>n;
	while(1)
	{
		rev = reverse(n);
		if(rev == n)
		{
			prm = prime(n);
			if(prm==1)
			{
				cout<<n;
				break;
			}
		}
		n++;
	}
	return 0;
}
